Method Detail

resizeSplit

public static void resizeSplit(boolean toMinimum,
                               JSplitPane splitPane)
Resize a JSplitPane to its maximum or minimum. Silently exits without resize if the split pane is not visible. Adapted from OneTouchActionHandler.actionPerformed in BasicSplitPaneDivider.

Parameters:
toMinimum - true indicates the resize should go the minimum (top or left) vs false which indicates the resize should go to the maximum.
splitPane - the split pane to adjust

packAllColumns

public static void packAllColumns(JTable table)
Pack all columns. Sets the preferred width of all columns so they will be just wide enough to show the column head and the widest cell in the column + a margin of 5 each side. NB: If a table has more than 100 rows, then only the width of the column header will be checked and not the widest cell value. Otherwise it could take too long.

Parameters:
table - table with columns to pack

packAllColumns

public static void packAllColumns(JTable table,
                                  int margin)
Pack all columns. Sets the preferred width of all columns so they will be just wide enough to show the column head and the widest cell in the column + margin each side. NB: If a table has more than 100 rows, then only the width of the column header will be checked and not the widest cell value. Otherwise it could take too long.

Parameters:
table - table with columns to pack
margin - margin to leave at each side of each column (resulting in an additional width of 2*margin pixels).

packColumn

public static void packColumn(JTable table,
                              int vColIndex,
                              int margin)
Pack specified column. Sets the preferred width of the specified visible column so it is will be just wide enough to show the column head and the widest cell value in the column + margin each side. Taken from http://www.exampledepot.com/egs/javax.swing.table/PackCol.html NB: If a table has more than 100 rows, then only the width of the column header will be checked and not the widest cell value. Otherwise it could take too long.

Parameters:
table - table with column to pack
vColIndex - column to pack
margin - margin to leave at each side of the column (resulting in an additional width of 2*margin pixels).
